section.name: Website Development
section.span: Publish your Hippo CMS managed content on the web.
section.p: Publishing dynamic content on the web is the most common use case for Hippo CMS. To integrate Hippo CMS in your new or existing web site, intranet or extranet, you can use the high level tools provided by Hippo.

tr.td: Using one of the available toolkits is the recommended way to develop websites for publishing Hippo CMS managed content. The toolkits help you create websites and portals using the technology of your choice.
Extend Hippo CMS with simple add-ons to add functionality to use with your website.

subsection.name: Alternative
subsection.p: If you need even more extra functionality to use with your website, the toolkits and/or the Hippo CMS can be extended by plugin developers. The extra functionality then becomes available for the webdevelopmers in a transparent way.

Information for plugin developers can be found at
HST Customization and CMS Customization, in particular the use of the standard JCR Interface.
